member.name: T:Umbraco.Hive.AbstractProviderBootstrapper
member.summary: An abstraction of a bootstrapper implemented by providers in order to handle any install tasks

member.summary: Creates any necessary configuration files/transforms for the provider to operate
member.param: The configuration xml file that needs to be written to

TODO: This is only a temporary way of passing arbitrary parameters to a provider to create its configuration, we need to allow hive providers to return a model for which we display a form/installer for and then pass in that model to the installParams
The provider key for the provider that is being configured

member.name: M:Umbraco.Hive.AbstractProviderBootstrapper.GetInstallStatus
member.summary: Gets the current installation status of the provider.

member.summary: Attempts to run installation tasks and reports status.

member.name: T:Umbraco.Hive.AbstractProviderDependencyBuilder
member.summary: An abstract type for creating Hive provider demand builders. Derived types must have a parameterless constructor to make instantiating simpler.

member.name: M:Umbraco.Hive.AbstractProviderDependencyBuilder.GetProviderDependencyHelperFactory(Umbraco.Framework.DependencyManagement.IBuilderContext)
member.summary: Gets the provider dependency helper factory. If a provider requires dependencies with a specific registration key, use this delegate to register a with the appropriate keyed dependencies. Otherwise, if this method returns null, will register a in its place.
